text: Demetrios Vikelas (also Demetrius Bikelas; ; 15 February 1835Some sources use the date 1832 (Llewellyn Smith, Olympics in Athens., 84) - 20 July 1908) was a Greek businessman and writer. He was the first President of the International Olympic Committee (IOC), from 1894 to 1896. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography of Demetrius Vikelas on the IOC website Category:1835 births Category:1908 deaths Category:European philanthropists Category:Greek historians Category:Presidents of the International Olympic Committee
title: Demetrius Vikelas
